title: What does "clean" mean?
body:
I've been called "clean" before and I can't seem to find the meaning anywhere? I'm quite new, and I'm not sure if this is an insult or a compliment.

cheers

replies.body: It is an instruction.  Take a shower you filthy beast.
generally means making a big flashy play without getting hit by cc and dying, that is highly impactful and can be followed by an emote and then moving to an objective.
basically complimenting a play that was flawlessly calculated.
If you make a good play then people say "That was clean" as in you pulled it off perfectly or smoothly.
It doesn't necessarily have to be a play, but usually is. "Clean" really is just you doing something without a mistake or with perfect execution, rendering the enemies actions as futile.

I've never seen this phrase before.

\*Reads other comments in thread\*

Oh...

Makes sense, then...
